name: Cathy's Crafts - A Time Management Game
name_original: Cathy's Crafts - A Time Management Game
description:
Manage your own crafting shop while enjoying the story of Cathy and her slightly eccentric cat, Ming! Craft loving customers will enter your store to create beautiful objects, but they'll need your help to make the most creative decorations. While assisting them, be sure to feed Ming from time to time; he's extremely cute & cuddly, but he gets really grumpy when he's hungry! You'll play in 6 different locations and you can customize your shops to give them the look you want. If you win all trophies you'll be able to call yourself a real Craft Shop Star! Have fun!

The first location is free with an in-game unlock for the full complement of locations.

Game Features:
- Enjoy the 1st season of Cathy's Crafts
- Play 60 lovely time management levels in 6 different locations
- Win all 18 trophies and become a real crafting star
- Help your customers create beautiful objects
- Delight yourself in the cute story of talented young Cathy and her funny cat, Ming

Write a review to support us!

Follow Cathy on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/cathyscraftsgame/

Enjoy GameHouse Original Stories:
- Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears
- Delicious - Emily's Home Sweet Home
- Delicious - Emily's New Beginning
- Fabulous - Angela's Fashion Fever
- Fabulous - Angela's Sweet Revenge
- Heart's Medicine - Time to Heal
